page.title: 18Kelhead Quarry-1
page.content:
Kelhead quarry has a working area of{7 {acres}which in the future will expand to{55 acres.}On average it extracts {750 tons of limestone per day.}Their annual target is{150,000 tons}but it can extract{190,000 tons.
The limestone dates from the{Jurassic and there are only 3 other deposits like it in Scotland being held together by a limestone cement like substance.
The limestone is used for many things,{by builders , for concrete {aggregate, agricultural lime and {drainage systems.}The quarry employs {10 workers}when extra men are needed, outside contractors are used and paid by the hour.
